20101207071349.333|20101207071351.000|CCO|WHEN KING TUT'S MUMMY WAS

20101207071431.000|20101207071441.000|CCO|UNKNOWN, STEPHEN COLBERT AND THE
20101207071441.000|20101207071442.667|CCO|PURSUIT OF THE PHARAOH'S
20101207071442.667|20101207071444.333|CCO|PHALACE.
20101207071444.333|20101207071446.000|CCO|I WOULD TRAVEL ANY DISTANCE, AS
